doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Kowsar Ahmed
doctor.workplace: Sylhet MAG Osmani Medical College & HospitalFormer Professor & Head (Psychiatry)Mymensingh Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Kowsar Ahmed is a highly experienced psychiatry specialist in Sylhet, holding an MBBS and MPhil in Psychiatry. He specializes in the treatment of mental health disorders including depression, anxiety, schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD), sleep disorders, dementia, and drug addiction. With an extensive academic background, he previously served as Assistant Professor of Psychiatry at Sylhet MAG Osmani Medical College & Hospital and as Professor & Head of Psychiatry at Mymensingh Medical College & Hospital. Dr. Kowsar Ahmed currently sees patients at Shahjalal Medical Services, located at 33, Arnob, Mirer Maidan, Police Line Road, Sylhet, from 4pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).
